content.raw: Could you describe the rational for the “results” folder? Looking at the train\_results.0.tab file it’s clear there’s some tracking of results on a per-instance basis although it’s not clear what specifically needs to be kept track of. What information needs to be stored here that can’t be inferred from looking at the contents of other directories?
content.html: Could you describe the rational for the “results” folder? Looking at the train_results.0.tab file it’s clear there’s some tracking of results on a per-instance basis although it’s not clear what specifically needs to be kept track of.
